column1: The  Respondents  assert  that  Circular  P16  has  no  final  effect  which  renders  this
application  to  be  premature  and  not  ripe  for  judicial  review.  Furthermore,  the
Respondents submit that as per Circular P16 it is evident that the Circular sought to
be quashed is temporary and in no way a final decision. It merely specifies that the
Circular P13 was suspended until further notice. Said Circular P16 reads as follows;
